plot: A dark secret hidden behind one mysterious girl who is an outcast whom the entire village alienates and a boy who tries to get close to her who has a tragedy of his own past. As romance blossoms, so as the false rumors.
title: Steel Cold Winter
plot_es: A dark secret hidden behind one mysterious girl who is an outcast whom the entire village alienates and a boy who tries to get close to her who has a tragedy of his own past. As romance blossoms, so as the false rumors.
